page.title: 01WELTON AND DUNHOLME.
page.content: This block mainly consists of good farming land (average cost Â£2000 acre) The villages of Welton (Pop 2599) and Dunholme (Pop 1562) are also included. They are both growing villages (approx 5 miles from Lincoln). Estate agents have no difficulty in selling houses that come on the market (3 bed semi average cost Â£24000) Both villages are popular places to live, especially for middle class families with young children. Both communities have energetic and supportive inhabitants therefore there are many different activities within each village. Welton is the larger village with more facilities. Both villages contain a Church. St. Mary's in Welton was rebuilt in 1823.St. Chad's Dunholme has an Early English Tower.
